ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: bah on that.... its just too tough to be paladin only.. maybe lower the stats a bit.... um it should be a lore , no drop etc.... but paladin only? nah ...
ygData.messageBody:
bah on that.... its just too tough to be paladin only.. maybe lower the
stats a bit.... um it should be a lore , no drop etc....
but paladin only?
nah
